subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king is considered as the founder of Rajasthan state?
question_hi: राजस्थान के स्थानांतरण के लिए किस सरकारी को ध्यान दिया गया ?
explanation_en: Rao Jodha is widely acknowledged as the founder of Rajasthan state. He played a significant role in uniting the Rajasthan region and established the state of Mewar.
explanation_hi: राव जोधा राजस्थान के लिए सभी राज्य के मेवार को बना प्राप्ति के लीज्वानी। उन्हें राजस्थान के लिए राज्य को बना और उन्हें राजस्थान के लिए राज्य को बना।
explanation_en: Rao Jodha is widely recognized as the founder of the Rajasthan state. He brought together the Rajasthan region and established the state of Mewar. Rajasthan was later formed by combining the territories of Rathore, Alwar, and Shekhawati clans.
explanation_hi: राव जोधा राजस्थान के लिए राज्य को बना और उन्हें राजस्थान को बना।
